author: Anonymous Comp
title: Past Final Exams
question: Hi, I am currently working on solving all the past final exams in for my final preparation. And I do just realized that 2021W1Final is not posted on the past exam page. Is this only for me or everyone is not seeing last term's final ? Is there any chance that it will be uploaded for further practice?
instructor_answer: I'm working on updating the graders for 2021w1-f.  They should be ready sometime next week.  So it will be available for further practice well in advance of the final.
